annotations.description: In this episode of How to Drink, we’re making an Improved Whiskey Cocktail, which might just be my favorite drink. If you know of any other variations for th...
annotations.title: Improved Whiskey Cocktail | How to Drink

textContent:
2oz Rye
.25oz Maraschino
.25oz Simple syrup
2 Dashes bitters
1 Dash absinthe

Stir and pour
Garnish with Lemon peel

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vWZySvRiHGU
title: Improved Whiskey Cocktail
